column5: Well we are T-minus 3 days and counting before departure. Question for the forum. My wife is bringing the laptop and wondering if anyone else has done so at DHL? Any problems with the wireless hook-up? Would like to post some pictures and fishing updates for you guys here. Mike
most camps these days have an internet service and provide wireless to customers. (they have to keep up with the times) so you should be able to get service.
Good luck on your trip! Save some for me!
